---
title: "101 Hello Shiny"
---


::: {.callout-important collapse="false"}
## Instructions
Modify the app to add "Hello World!" to the main heading. 
Click the play button to run the app.
:::


::::: {.column-screen-inset}
::: {.panel-tabset}
## Goal
```{shinylive-python}
#| standalone: true
#| components: [viewer]
#| layout: horizontal
#| viewerHeight: 800
from shiny.express import ui

ui.h1("Hello World!")

## file: requirements.txt
pandas
plotly
```
## Problem
```{shinylive-python}
#| standalone: true
#| components: [editor, viewer]
#| layout: horizontal
#| viewerHeight: 800
from shiny.express import ui

ui.h1("")

## file: requirements.txt
pandas
plotly
```
## Solution
```{shinylive-python}
#| standalone: true
#| components: [editor, viewer]
#| layout: horizontal
#| viewerHeight: 800
from shiny.express import ui

ui.h1("Hello World!")

## file: requirements.txt
pandas
plotly
```

The source code for this exercise is at <https://github.com/posit-conf-2024/intro-to-shiny-for-python/tree/main/docs/exercises/express-101-hello-world/problem>.
:::
